alert.note: Alert for Christian; Stone (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 9:51AM CST until March 05 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... James River near Boaz affecting Stone and Christian Counties. James River at Galena affecting Stone County. .Heavy rainfall that occurred in the upper James River Basin late Thursday and today will likely cause river levels to rise to flood stage. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River near Boaz. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Low lying areas near the river flood. Flows may be dangerous for canoers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CST Friday the stage was 7.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.0 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
